description: This file defines a UserProvider class that manages user authentication state and theme mode in a Flutter application. It provides getter methods to access user authentication status, user data, and theme mode, as well as setter methods to update the user and theme mode, notifying listeners on changes.

classes.name: UserProvider
classes.description: A ChangeNotifier that manages user authentication state and theme mode, providing methods to update user data and theme preferences.

methods.name: setUser
methods.description: Sets the current user and notifies listeners of the change.

methods.name: setTheme
methods.description: Sets the theme mode and notifies listeners of the change.

methods.name: isAuthenticated
methods.description: Returns true if a user is currently authenticated.

methods.name: themeMode
methods.description: Getter for the current theme mode.

methods.name: user
methods.description: Getter for the current user object.
